author: Staff Reporter
text:
Twelve school children suffered minor injuries after the autorickshaw they were travelling fell on its side on Monday morning.

The autorickshaw driven by Boopathi was on its way to a school in P. Nattamangalam in Kondalampatti.

Another autorickshaw, driven by Saravanan, with a few passengers was on its way to Nethimedu. While nearing Nethimedu, a dog tried to cross the road and was hit by the autorickshaw driven by Saravanan. The autorickshaw fell on its side and three passengers were injured.

On seeing this, Boopathi applied brake and his vehicle also fell on its side.

The children suffered minor injuries and were taken to Government Mohan Kumaramangalam Medical College Hospital.
title: School children injured
